answers.answer: I wouldn't worry to much most cases of gestational diabetes can be controlled with diet alone which lo sure the doctor will explain to you
I agree^^ I wouldn't be too concerned. You may have to meet with a nutritionist and watch your diet during pregnancy but it is something that can be easily controlled. Good luck :)

question: I'm 30 weeks pregnant and had my glucose test a few days ago they called me the day after and said I was high risk and see a specialist should I be really worried?
title: high glucose test
